title: Anyone know a good font to go with Enabler?
content: I am struggling to find a display font to go with Enabler ( [http://www.t26.com/fonts/226-Enabler](http://web.archive.org/web/20090507185518/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/226-Enabler "http://www.t26.com/fonts/226-Enabler")), any ideas?
author: timkl

comments.content:
in my opinion, enabler should be your display font and you should use another font for copy text. itâ€™s not very readable over long texts but looks great when you use it as a display font.. looks very nice in all caps!  
by the way, have you tried [progress](http://web.archive.org/web/20090507185518/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/796-Progress) which has more styles!
